title: Hour 2: East Mode
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Michael Irvin, and Ryan Clark debate whether the Bills' comeback win against the Ravens last night was more due to a winning effort by Buffalo or an epic Baltimore collapse. After yet another loss, Stephen A. has a message for Baker Mayfield and the Panthers. "The Playmaker" himself Michael Irvin gives us his top playmakers for Week 4. The crew debates if the NFC East is the best division in football right now. Plus, we have reaction to news relating to Tua Tagovailoa's head injury.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Is the NFC East the best division in the NFL?
